price: آيا ستاسو كافران تر هغوى غوره دي يا تاسو ته په پخوانيو كتابونو كې څه خلاصون راغلى دى؟
arabic: أَكُفَّارُكُمۡ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡ أُوْلَٰٓئِكُمۡ أَمۡ لَكُم بَرَآءَةٞ فِي ٱلزُّبُرِ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: akuffārukum khayrun min ulāikum am lakum barāatun fī al-zuburi
